title: Love
content:
Title: Intern Diaries
Theme: Love Story

INT. OFFICE - DAY
The bustling office of a tech startup is filled with the hum of computers and chatter. AMELIA, 23, a shy but brilliant intern, sits at her desk, typing furiously on her laptop. Her desk is neatly organized, with a small potted plant adding a touch of warmth. Across the room, LIAM, 25, a charming and confident intern, is presenting an idea to a group of colleagues. His eyes occasionally flicker toward Amelia, who doesn't notice.

AMELIA (V.O.)
(softly)
First days are always nerve-wracking, but there's something about this place... or maybe someone.

Liam finishes his presentation, earning a round of applause. He walks over to Amelia's desk, holding two coffee cups.

LIAM
(smiling)
Hey, Amelia, right? Thought you might need a coffee to survive the morning.

AMELIA
(blushing)
Oh, thanks, Liam. That's... really nice.

They share a shy smile, and the camera lingers on their hands brushing as she takes the coffee.

EXT. CITY PARK - EVENING
Amelia and Liam walk through a vibrant city park, the sunset casting a golden glow. They're both in casual clothes, carrying laptops in their bags, clearly coming from a long day at work. They stop by a fountain, where Liam playfully splashes water at Amelia.

AMELIA
(laughing)
You're going to regret that!

She splashes back, and they end up in a playful chase around the fountain. Their laughter echoes as they collapse onto a bench, catching their breath.

LIAM
(earnest)
You know, I didn't expect to find someone like you in this internship. You make these long days... fun.

AMELIA
(looking down, then up)
I didn't expect it either. But I'm glad.

Their eyes meet, and the moment is charged with unspoken feelings. A soft breeze rustles the leaves around them.

INT. OFFICE - NIGHT
The office is quiet, with only a few lights on. Amelia and Liam are working late on a project, their desks pushed together. Papers and laptops are scattered around, but there's a comfortable silence between them. Amelia sketches a design on a notepad, and Liam watches her with admiration.

LIAM
(quietly)
You're really good at this, you know. I think we're going to nail this project because of you.

AMELIA
(smiling)
We’re a team, Liam. I couldn't do it without your crazy ideas.

They laugh softly, and Liam reaches for her hand. She hesitates, then laces her fingers with his. The camera pulls back to show the empty office, their silhouettes illuminated by the desk lamp.

EXT. ROOFTOP - NIGHT
Amelia and Liam stand on the office building's rooftop, the city skyline sparkling below. They're dressed up, as if attending a company event that just ended. Amelia leans against the railing, and Liam stands close, their shoulders touching.

AMELIA
(softly)
This internship... it's been more than I expected. Not just the work, but... us.

LIAM
(looking at her)
Amelia, I don't want this to end when the internship does. I want to see where this goes.

She turns to him, her eyes shining with emotion. They lean in, and the camera pans up to the stars as they share a gentle kiss, the city lights twinkling in the background.

FADE OUT.

scenes.description: The bustling office of a tech startup is filled with the hum of computers and chatter, with Amelia typing furiously on her laptop and Liam presenting an idea to a group of colleagues, occasionally glancing at Amelia. The camera pans across the room, showing the vibrant atmosphere. Liam walks over to Amelia's desk, holding two coffee cups, and they share a shy smile.

The camera pans across the room, showing the vibrant atmosphere. Liam walks over to Amelia's desk, holding two coffee cups, and they share a shy smile.

The camera follows them, capturing their laughter and joyful movements. They collapse onto a bench, catching their breath, and their eyes meet, charged with unspoken feelings.

The office is quiet, with only a few lights on, and Amelia and Liam are working late on a project, their desks pushed together, surrounded by papers and laptops. The camera zooms in on their hands as Liam reaches for Amelia's, and they lace their fingers together. The camera pulls back to show the empty office, their silhouettes illuminated by the desk lamp, creating a cozy atmosphere.

Amelia and Liam stand on the office building's rooftop, the city skyline sparkling below, and they're dressed up, as if attending a company event that just ended. The camera pans out to show the breathtaking view, and Amelia turns to Liam, her eyes shining with emotion. They lean in, and the camera pans up to the stars as they share a gentle kiss, the city lights twinkling in the background.
